name: Nyaaaah! 11
overview: Poor old Snodge the Biblet. He cannot seem to rest. Although the Evil Squatter has been defeated and destroyed back in an older Nyaaaah! adventure. A brand new ruler decides to take over Bibletsville. King Squit is his name, and he's much nastier than Evil Squatter. King Squit has turned all good Biblets into evil and he has also captured a load of Snodge's friends. Then left them stranded by a river bank. Snodge sets off on a brand new adventure, in which he has to make his way through the Bibletsville woods, Biblet Barracks, cliffs of death and also underneath the surface, where King Squit will be waiting for his final battle against Snodge.
